text: Egh nɨ uaghan fofozir gumazir aghuitaba mɨseveghtɨ, me gumazamizibar dapanibar ikiam. Eghtɨ tarazi 1,000plan gumazamizibar gantɨma, tarazi 100plan gumazamizibar gantɨma, tarazi 50plan gantɨma, tarazi 10plan ganam. Gumazir kaba uari abɨnigh guizbangɨra Godɨn atiatingɨva an apengan ikɨ, egh gumazir e nɨghnɨzir gavgavim men itibar, mɨn ikɨ. Gumazamiziba dagɨaba me danɨng, me gekutɨ, me arazir kurabar amuan kogham.
